mapper.select: SELECT l.course_list_id, l.curriculum_id, IF(m.modify_id,m.weekday,l.weekday) as weekday, IF(m.modify_id,m.section,l.section) as section, l.class_id, l.term_id, l.course_type, l.create_date, l.edit_date, l.del, IF(m.modify_id,m.position_id,l.position_id) as position_id, IF(m.modify_id,mp.place,p.place) as place, IF(m.modify_id,mp.number,p.number) as number, IF(l.course_type=4,e.curriculum_name,c.curriculum_name) as curriculum_name, IF(l.course_type=4,'',c.start_week) as start_week, IF(l.course_type=4,'',c.end_week) as end_week, IF(l.course_type=4,e.teacher_id,c.teacher_id) as teacher_id, IF(l.course_type=4,e.teacher_name,c.teacher_name) as teacher_name, IF(l.course_type=4,e.start_time,'') as start_time, IF(l.course_type=4,e.end_time,'') as end_time, IF(l.course_type=4,e.weeke,'') as weeke FROM lab_course_list l LEFT JOIN lab_position p ON p.position_id = l.position_id AND p.del = 0 LEFT JOIN lab_curriculum_name c ON c.curriculum_id = l.curriculum_id AND c.del = 0 AND l.course_type != 4 LEFT JOIN lab_modify_course m ON m.curriculum_id = l.course_list_id AND m.del = 0 LEFT JOIN lab_position mp ON mp.position_id = m.position_id AND mp.del = 0 LEFT JOIN lab_exam e ON e.exam_id = l.curriculum_id AND e.del = 0 AND l.course_type = 4 WHERE l.del = 0 AND l.term_id = 5 AND l.class_id = 1 AND l.weekday = 1 AND IF ( c.start_week <= 15 AND c.end_week >= 15, ( c.start_week <= 15 AND c.end_week >= 15 ), e.weeke = 15 )
